summary.span: 使用用户定义的模板显示数据源的值。

span.span: Displays the values of a data source by using user-defined templates.

summary.span: 控件使用户可以选择、删除、编辑、插入记录及对其进行排序。

span.span: The control enables users to select, sort, delete, edit, and insert records.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [模板Templates](#templates) - [绑定到数据源Binding to a Data Source](#binding_to_a_data_source) - [数据操作Data Operations](#data_operations) - [事件Events](#Events) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件用于显示数据源中的值。The control is used to display the values from a data source. 它类似于 控件，只不过它使用用户定义的模板而不是行字段来显示数据。It resembles the control, except that it displays data by using user-defined templates instead of row fields. 创建自己的模板使你可以更灵活地控制数据的显示方式。Creating your own templates gives you more flexibility in controlling how the data is displayed. 本主题提供了包含源代码的 Visual Studio 项目：[下载](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=199759)。A Visual Studio project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=199759). 控件支持以下功能：The control supports the following features: - 支持绑定到数据源控件，如 、和 。Support for binding to data source controls such as , , and . - 通过用户定义的模板和样式自定义外观。Customizable appearance through user-defined templates and styles. - 内置的排序功能。Built-in sorting capabilities. - 内置的更新和删除功能。Built-in update and delete capabilities. - 内置插入功能。Built-in insert capabilities. - 通过使用 控件支持分页功能。Support for paging capabilities by using a control. - 内置项选择功能。Built-in item selection capabilities. - 以编程方式访问 对象模型，以动态设置属性、处理事件等。Programmatic access to the object model to dynamically set properties, handle events, and so on. - 多个键字段。Multiple key fields. 若要了解 ASP.NET 中可用的其他数据绑定控件，请参阅[数据绑定 Web 服务器控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms228214(v=vs.100))。To learn about other data-bound controls that are available in ASP.NET, see [Data-Bound Web Server Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms228214(v=vs.100)). ## 模板Templates 为了使 控件能够显示内容，您必须为控件的不同部分创建模板。In order for the control to display content, you must create templates for different parts of the control. 是必需的。The is required. 所有其他模板都是可选的。All other templates are optional. 属性不是必需的。The property is not required. 但是，您必须为在其中配置控件的模式创建模板。However, you must create a template for the mode in which the control is configured. 例如，支持插入记录的 控件必须定义 模板。For example, a control that supports inserting records must have an template defined. 下表列出了可以为 控件创建的模板。The following table lists the templates that you can create for the control. |模板类型Template type|说明Description| |-------------------|-----------------| ||用于定义容器对象的根模板，如 `table`、`div`或 `span` 元素，它将包含 或 模板中定义的内容。The root template that defines a container object, such as a `table`, `div`, or `span` element, that will contain the content defined in the or template. 它还可能包含一个 对象。It might also contain a object.| ||定义要为各项显示的数据绑定内容。Defines the data-bound content to display for individual items.| ||定义要在各个项之间呈现的内容。Defines the content to render between individual items.| ||定义容器对象，如表行（`tr`）、`div`或 `span` 元素，这些元素将包含在 和 模板中定义的内容。Defines a container object, such as a table row (`tr`), `div`, or `span` element, that will contain the content defined in the and templates. 组中显示的项的数目由 属性指定。The number of items that are displayed in a group is specified by the property.| ||定义要在项组之间呈现的内容。Defines the content to render between groups of items.| ||定义使用 模板时为空项呈现的内容。Defines the content to render for an empty item when a template is used. 例如，如果将 属性设置为5，并且从数据源返回的项的总数为8，则 控件显示的最后一组数据将包含 模板指定的三个项，以及 模板所指定的两个项。For example, if the property is set to 5, and the total number of items returned from the data source is 8, the last group of data displayed by the control will contain three items as specified by the template, and two items as specified by the template.| ||定义数据源未返回任何数据时要呈现的内容。Defines the content to render if the data source returns no data.| ||定义要为选定数据项呈现的内容，以便将所选项与其他项区分开来。Defines the content to render for the selected data item to differentiate the selected item from other items.| ||定义要为替换项呈现的内容，以便更容易区分连续项。Defines the content to render for alternating items to make it easier to distinguish between consecutive items.| ||定义要在编辑项时呈现的内容。Defines the content to render when an item is being edited. 模板将呈现为正在编辑的数据项的 模板。The template is rendered in place of the template for the data item that is being edited.| ||定义要呈现的用于插入项的内容。Defines the content to render to insert an item. 模板在 控件所显示的项的开头或结尾处呈现 模板的位置。The template is rendered in place of an template at either the start or at the end of the items that are displayed by the control. 您可以使用 控件的 属性指定 模板的呈现位置。You can specify where the template is rendered by using the property of the control.| 若要在 中显示某个字段的值，请使用数据绑定表达式。To display the value of a field in a template such as , you use a data-binding expression. 有关数据绑定表达式的详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定表达式概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178366(v=vs.100))。For more information about data-binding expressions, see [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178366(v=vs.100)). 若要将 和 模板中的输入控件绑定到数据源的字段，可以使用双向绑定表达式。To bind input controls in the and templates to fields of a data source, you can use two-way binding expressions. 这使得 控件可以自动提取用于更新或插入操作的输入控件的值。This enables the control to automatically extract the values of the input control for an update or insert operation. 双向绑定表达式还允许 中的输入控件自动显示原始字段值。Two-way binding expressions also enable input controls in an to automatically display the original field values. 有关双向绑定表达式的详细信息，请参阅[绑定到数据库](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178361(v=vs.100))。For more information about two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178361(v=vs.100)). ## 绑定到数据源Binding to a Data Source 可以将 控件绑定到数据源控件（如 控件或 控件），也可以绑定到实现 接口的任何数据源集合，例如 、、或其他集合类型。You can bind the control to a data source control (such as the control or control) or to any data source collection that implements the interface, such as , , , or other collection types. 使用以下方法之一将 控件绑定到相应的数据源类型：Use one of the following methods to bind the control to the appropriate data source type: - 若要绑定到数据源控件，请将 控件的 属性设置为数据源控件的 值。To bind to a data source control, set the property of the control to the value of the data source control. 控件将自动绑定到指定的数据源控件，并可以利用数据源控件的功能执行排序、插入、更新、删除和分页功能。The control automatically binds to the specified data source control and can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities to perform sorting, inserting, updating, deleting, and paging functionality. 这是绑定到数据的首选方法。This is the preferred method to bind to data. - 若要绑定到实现 接口的数据源，请以编程方式将 控件的 属性设置为数据源，然后调用 方法。To bind to a data source that implements the interface, programmatically set the property of the control to the data source, and then call the method. 使用此方法时， 控件不提供内置排序、更新、删除和分页功能。When you use this technique, the control does not provide built-in sorting, updating, deleting, and paging functionality. 必须通过使用相应的事件来提供此功能。You must provide this functionality by using the appropriate event. 有关数据绑定的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 数据访问内容映射](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/6759sth4(v=vs.100))。For more information about data binding, see [ASP.NET Data Access Content Map](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/6759sth4(v=vs.100)). > [!NOTE] > 控件可用于显示用户输入，其中可能包括恶意的客户端脚本。The control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前，请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before you display it in the application. 我们强烈建议在可能的情况下，在该控件中显示值之前，尽可能对它们进行 HTML 编码。We strongly recommend that values be HTML-encoded whenever possible before they are displayed in this control. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来帮助阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to help block script and HTML in user input. 你还可以使用验证服务器控件来检查用户输入。You can also use validation server controls to check user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[验证控件简介](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/2e4hd649(v=vs.85))。For more information, see [Introduction to the Validation Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/2e4hd649(v=vs.85)). ## 数据操作Data Operations 将 控件绑定到数据源控件时， 控件可以利用数据源控件的功能，并提供自动排序、插入、更新和删除功能。When the control is bound to a data source control, the control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic sort, insert, update, and delete functionality. > [!NOTE] > 控件可以为其他类型的数据源提供排序、插入、更新和删除的支持。The control can provide support for sorting, inserting, updating, and deleting with other types of data sources. 但是，若要实现这些操作，必须在相应的事件处理程序中创建代码。However, in order to implement these operations, you must create code in an appropriate event handler. 由于 控件使用模板，因此它不提供自动生成按钮以执行更新、删除、插入、排序或选择操作的方法。Because the control uses templates, it does not provide a way to automatically generate buttons to perform update, delete, insert, sort, or select operations. 你必须在相应的模板中手动包含这些按钮。You must manually include these buttons in the appropriate template. 控件识别 属性设置为特定值的某些按钮。The control recognizes certain buttons whose property is set to a specific value. 下表列出了 控件识别的按钮及其功能。The following table lists the buttons that the control recognizes and their functions. |按钮Button|CommandName 值CommandName value|说明Description| |------------|-----------------------|-----------------| |取消Cancel|退出"Cancel"|取消编辑或插入操作。Cancels an edit or insert operation. 引发 事件。Raises the event.| |删除Delete|“Delete”"Delete"|从数据源中删除当前记录。Deletes the current record from the data source. 引发 和 事件。Raises the and events.| |选择Select|单击"Select"|将 属性设置为项的 属性值。Sets the property to the property value for the item. 呈现项的 模板。Renders the template for the item. 引发 和 事件。Raises the and events.| |编辑Edit|编辑"Edit"|将项置于编辑模式。Puts the item in edit mode. 呈现项的 模板。Renders the template for the item. 引发 事件。Raises the event.| |插入Insert|&"Insert"|将 模板中的绑定值插入到数据源中。Inserts the bound values from the template into the data source. 引发 和 事件。Raises the and events.| |更新Update|时更新"Update"|用来自 模板的绑定值更新数据源中的当前记录。Updates the current record in the data source with the bound values from the template. 引发 和 事件。Raises the and events.| |排序Sort|进行"Sort"|对按钮的 `CommandArgument` 属性中列出的列进行排序。Sorts the columns listed in the `CommandArgument` property of the button. 引发 和 事件。Raises the and events.| 与 "删除" 按钮（它会立即删除当前数据项）不同，单击 "编辑" 按钮时， 控件将在编辑模式下显示当前项。Unlike the Delete button (which deletes the current data item immediately), when the Edit button is clicked, the control displays the current item in edit mode. 在编辑模式下，将为当前数据项显示 属性中包含的内容。In edit mode, the content that is contained in the property is displayed for the current data item. 通常，在 "编辑项" 模板中，"编辑" 按钮将替换为更新和 "取消" 按钮。Typically, in the edit item template, the Edit button is replaced with an Update and a Cancel button. 适用于字段的数据类型（如 或 控件）的输入控件通常还显示字段的值，供用户修改。Input controls that are appropriate for the field's data type (such as a or control) also usually display a field's value for a user to modify. 单击 "更新" 按钮将更新数据源中的记录，单击 "取消" 按钮将取消编辑操作。Clicking the Update button updates the record in the data source, and clicking the Cancel button cancels the edit operation. 当 属性设置为 或 时，将启用插入功能。The insert functionality is enabled when the property is set to or . 此属性定义为插入项呈现 模板的位置。This property defines where the template is rendered for the insert item. 插入项模板通常包含一个 "插入" 和 "取消" 按钮，并为用户显示空输入控件以输入新记录的值。The insert item template typically includes an Insert and a Cancel button, and empty input controls are displayed for users to enter the values for the new record. 单击 "插入" 按钮会在数据源中插入记录，单击 "取消" 按钮将清除所有字段。Clicking the Insert button inserts the record in the data source, and clicking the Cancel button clears all the fields. ### 排序Sorting 通过单击 "排序" 按钮，用户可以使用 控件对项进行排序。The control enables users to sort the items by clicking the Sort button. Sort 功能在包含要排序的列的按钮的 `CommandArgument` 属性中定义。Sort functionality is defined in the `CommandArgument` property of the button that contains the columns to be sorted. ### PagingPaging 控件可以将记录分成不同的页，而不是同时显示数据源中的所有记录。Instead of displaying all the records from the data source at the same time, the control can break the records into pages. 若要启用分页，请将 控件与 控件相关联。To enable paging, associate a control with the control. 然后在 模板中插入 控件。Then insert a control inside the template. 或者，如果 控件超出 控件，则将 属性设置为 控件的 。Alternatively, if the control is outside the control, set the property to the of the control. ## EventsEvents 下表列出了 控件支持的事件。The following table lists the events that are supported by the control. |事件Event|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||在单击 "取消" 按钮（其 `CommandName` 属性设置为 "取消" 的按钮）时，但在 控件取消插入或编辑操作之前发生。Occurs when the Cancel button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Cancel") is clicked, but before the control cancels the insert or edit operation. 此事件通常用于停止取消操作。This event is often used to stop the cancel operation.| ||在 控件中单击某个按钮时发生。Occurs when a button is clicked in the control. 当单击控件中的按钮时，此事件通常用于执行自定义任务。This event is often used to perform a custom task when a button is clicked in the control.| ||在 控件中创建新项时发生。Occurs when a new item is created in the control. 此事件通常用于在创建项时修改项的内容。This event is often used to modify the content of an item when the item is created.| ||当数据项绑定到 控件中的数据时发生。Occurs when a data item is bound to data in the control. 当项绑定到数据时，此事件通常用于修改项的内容。This event is often used to modify the content of an item when the item is bound to data.| ||当单击 "删除" 按钮（其 `CommandName` 属性设置为 "Delete" 的按钮）或调用 方法（在 控件从数据源删除记录）后发生。Occurs when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") is clicked or the method is called, after the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用于检查删除操作的结果。This event is often used to check the results of the delete operation.| ||在单击 "删除" 按钮（其 `CommandName` 属性设置为 "Delete" 的按钮）或调用 方法，但在 控件从数据源中删除记录之前发生。Occurs when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") is clicked or the method is called, but before the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用于确认或取消删除操作。This event is often used to confirm or cancel the delete operation.| ||在单击 "编辑" 按钮（其 `CommandName` 属性设置为 "编辑" 的按钮）时，但在 控件进入编辑模式之前发生。Occurs when an Edit button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Edit") is clicked, but before the control enters edit mode. 此事件通常用于取消编辑操作。This event is often used to cancel the editing operation.| ||在单击 "插入" 按钮（其 `CommandName` 属性设置为 "插入" 的按钮）或调用 方法（在 控件从数据源插入新记录）后发生。Occurs when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") is clicked or the method is called, after the control inserts the new record from the data source. 此事件通常用于检查插入操作的结果。This event is often used to check the results of the insert operation.| ||单击 "插入" 按钮（其 `CommandName` 属性设置为 "插入" 的按钮）或调用 方法，但在 控件插入记录之前发生。Occurs when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") is clicked or the method is called, but before the control inserts the record. 此事件通常用于取消插入操作或更改或验证新项的值。This event is often used to cancel the insert operation or change or validate the values of the new item.| ||当单击 "更新" 按钮（其 `CommandName` 属性设置为 "Update" 的按钮）或调用 方法（在 控件更新记录）后发生。Occurs when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") is clicked or the method is called, after the control updates the record. 此事件通常用于检查更新操作的结果。This event is often used to check the results of the update operation.| ||在单击 "更新" 按钮（其 `CommandName` 属性设置为 "Update" 的按钮）或调用 方法，但在 控件更新记录之前发生。Occurs when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") is clicked or the method is called, but before the control updates the record. 此事件通常用于取消更新操作或更改或验证所编辑的项的值。This event is often used to cancel the updating operation or change or validate the values of the edited item.| ||在 控件中创建 模板后发生。Occurs when the template is created in a control. 此事件通常用于在创建模板后执行任务。This event is often used to perform a task after the template is created.| ||在页属性更改且 控件设置新值之后发生。Occurs when the page properties change, after the control sets the new values.| ||当数据页属性更改，但在 控件设置新值之前发生。Occurs when the data-page properties change, but before the control sets the new values.| ||单击 "选择" 按钮（其 `CommandName` 属性设置为 "Select" 的按钮）时，在 控件处理选择操作之后发生。Occurs when a Select button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Select") is clicked, after the control handles the select operation. 此事件通常用于在控件中选择项后执行自定义任务。This event is often used to perform a custom task after an item is selected in the control.| ||在单击 "选择" 按钮（其 `CommandName` 属性设置为 "Select" 的按钮）时，但在 控件处理选择操作之前发生。Occurs when a Select button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Select") is clicked, but before the control handles the select operation. 此事件通常用于取消选择操作。This event is often used to cancel the select operation.| ||当单击排序按钮（其 `CommandName` 属性设置为 "Sort" 的按钮）或调用 方法（在 控件处理排序操作）后发生。Occurs when a Sort button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Sort") is clicked or the method is called, after the control handles the sort operation. 此事件通常用于在用户单击排序按钮后执行自定义任务，并对数据进行排序。This event is typically used to perform a custom task after a user clicks a Sort button and the data has been sorted.| ||在单击排序按钮（其 `CommandName` 属性设置为 "Sort" 的按钮）或调用 方法但在 控件处理排序操作之前发生。Occurs when a Sort button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Sort") is clicked or the method is called, but before the control handles the sort operation. 此事件通常用于取消排序操作或执行自定义的排序例程。This event is often used to cancel the sorting operation or to perform a custom sorting routine.| ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 控件通过使用 HTML 表显示数据库中的记录。The following example shows how to use the control to display records from a database by using an HTML table. 使用 控件检索值。The values are retrieved by using a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性为交替数据项定义自定义用户界面（UI）。Use the property to define a custom user interface (UI) for the alternating data item. 模板通常包含与 模板相同的控件和内容，但具有不同的外观来区分项。The template usually contains the same controls and content as the template, but with a different appearance to distinguish items. 若要以声明的方式指定自定义模板，请在 控件内添加 `AlternatingItemTemplate` 元素。To specify the custom template declaratively, add an `AlternatingItemTemplate` element inside the control. 然后在开始和结束 `` 标记之间添加控件和内容。Then add controls and content between the opening and closing `` tags. 若要显示数据源中的字段值，请使用数据绑定表达式。To display the field values from the data source, use a data-binding expression. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定表达式概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178366(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178366(v=vs.100)). 若要创建自动选择、删除和编辑操作的按钮，请向模板添加一个按钮控件。To create buttons that automatically select, delete, and edit operations, add a button control to the template. 将其 属性设置为下表中列出的值之一。Set its property to one of the values listed in the following table. |按钮类型Button type|CommandName 值CommandName value| |-----------------|-----------------------| |删除Delete|“Delete”"Delete"| |编辑Edit|编辑"Edit"| |选择Select|单击"Select"| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 模板来定义 控件中交替数据项的样式。The following example shows how to use the template to define the style for alternating data items in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.AlternatingItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.AlternatingItemTemplate/CS/ListViewAlternatingItemTemplateCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.AlternatingItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.AlternatingItemTemplate/VB/ListViewAlternatingItemTemplateVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置数据字段的名称，当 属性设置为 时，这些数据字段的值用于唯一地标识 控件的每个数据行。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the data field whose value is used to uniquely identify each data row of a control when the property is set to .

value.span: 数据字段的名称，当 ASP.NET 生成 值时，这些数据字段的值用于唯一地标识 控件的每个实例。

span.span: The name of the data field whose value is used to uniquely identify each instance of a control when ASP.NET generates the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要防止在 控件的多个行中呈现控件的多个实例时出现命名冲突，ASP.NET 将为控件的每个实例生成唯一的 值。To prevent naming conflicts when multiple instances of a control are rendered in multiple rows of a control, ASP.NET generates a unique value for each instance of the control. 通过设置 属性指定如何生成 值。You specify how the value is generated by setting the property. 如果将 属性设置为 ，则 ASP.NET 会通过追加一个派生自 中指定的数据字段的后缀来生成 。If you set the property to , ASP.NET generates the by appending a suffix that is derived from the data field specified in . 如果未设置 ，则后缀为序列号。If is not set, the suffix is a sequential number.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个数组，该数组包含了显示在 控件中的项的主键字段的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets an array that contains the names of the primary key fields for the items displayed in a control.

value.span: 一个数组，其中包含了显示在 控件中的项的主键字段的名称。

span.span: An array that contains the names of the primary key fields for the items displayed in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定表示数据源的主键的一个或多个字段。Use the property to specify the field or fields that represent the primary key of the data source. 若要以声明方式设置此属性，请使用以逗号分隔的字段名称列表。To set this property declaratively, use a comma-separated list of field names. 设置 属性后， 控件将自动用指定的一个或多个字段中的值填充其 集合。When the property is set, the control automatically populates its collection with the values from the specified field or fields. 这提供了一种便捷的方式来访问每个项的主键。This provides a convenient way to access the primary keys of each item. > [!IMPORTANT] > 控件在控件状态字段中存储键字段值。The control stores key field values in the control-state field. 如果这些值包含敏感信息，我们建议您通过将 属性设置为 `ViewStateEncryptionMode.Always`来启用视图状态加密。If these values contain sensitive information, we recommend that you enable view-state encryption by setting the property to `ViewStateEncryptionMode.Always`. 要使 控件的自动更新和删除功能正常工作，必须将该属性设置为 ""。You must set the property for the automatic updating and deleting features of the control to work. 这些键字段的值将传递到数据源控件，以便与要更新或删除的项匹配。The values of these key fields are passed to the data source control in order to match the item to update or delete. 使用 属性指定为数据键的字段在更新和删除操作过程中通过使用 `Keys` 集合传递到数据源控件。Fields that are specified as data keys by using the property are passed to the data source control during update and delete operations by using the `Keys` collection. 数据键字段会传递到数据源控件，即使它们未绑定到模板中的控件。Data key fields are passed to the data source control even if they are not bound to controls in a template. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性指定数据源的键字段。The following example shows how to use the property to specify the key field of the data source. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemCommand#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemCommand/CS/ListViewItemCommandCS.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemCommand#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemCommand/VB/ListViewItemCommandVB.aspx#3)]

summary.span: 获取一个 对象集合，这些对象表示 控件中的每一项的数据键值。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that represent the data-key value for each item in a control.

value.span: 一个对象，包含 控件中的每一项的数据键。

span.span: An object that contains the data key for each item in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置 属性后， 控件会自动为控件中的每一项创建一个 对象。When the property is set, the control automatically creates a object for each item in the control. 对象包含在 属性中指定的一个或多个字段的值。The object contains the values of the field or fields that are specified in the property. 然后， 对象将添加到控件的 集合。The objects are then added to the control's collection. 使用 属性可以检索 控件中特定数据项的 对象。Use the property to retrieve the object for a specific data item in the control. 您可以使用 属性检索当前选定项的 对象。You can use the property to retrieve the object for the currently selected item. 你还可以使用 属性直接检索当前选定项的数据键值。You can also use the property to retrieve the data-key value for the currently selected item directly. 您可以使用 属性检索单击了命令按钮的项的 对象。You can use the property to retrieve the object for the item for which a command button was clicked. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性确定 控件中项的数据键值。The following example shows how to use the property to determine the data-key values for the items in a control. 它还演示了如何根据数据项而不是使用索引的默认行为保留用户选择。It also shows how to preserve the user selection based on a data item instead of the default behavior that uses the index. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged/CS/ListViewItemSelectedIndexChanged2CS.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged/VB/ListViewItemSelectedIndexChanged2VB.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 属性以编程方式指定或确定 控件中要编辑的项。You can use the property to programmatically specify or determine which item in a control to edit. 如果将此属性设置为控件中的项的索引，则该项在编辑模式下显示。When this property is set to the index of an item in the control, that item is displayed in edit mode. 在编辑模式下，通过使用 模板而不是 模板来呈现项。In edit mode, the item is rendered by using the template instead of the template. 您可以使用数据绑定控件填充 以使用户能够修改项的值。You can populate the with data-bound controls to enable users to modify values for the item. 若要从编辑模式切换到显示模式，请将此属性设置为-1。To switch from edit mode to display mode, set this property to -1. 当必须以编程方式确定要编辑的项时，或将自定义编辑功能添加到 控件时，通常使用 属性。The property is typically used when you have to programmatically determine which item is being edited, or when you are adding custom editing functionality to the control. 如果向项模板添加一个按钮，该按钮的 属性设置为 `Edit`，则该 控件具有内置的编辑功能，该功能会自动将项置于编辑模式。The control has a built-in editing feature that automatically puts an item in edit mode if you add a button to the item template whose property is set to `Edit`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来确定项在 控件中是否处于编辑模式。The following example shows how to use the property to determine whether an item is in edit mode in the control. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem/CS/ListViewDataItemDataItemCS.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem/VB/ListViewDataItemDataItemVB.aspx#2)]

span.span: Gets or sets the custom content for the item in edit mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以定义编辑模式下的项的自定义用户界面（UI）。Use the property to define a custom user interface (UI) for the item in edit mode. 模板通常包含用于更新现有记录值的用户的输入控件。The template usually contains the input controls for the user to update the values of an existing record. 它通常还包含用于更新记录和取消更新操作的按钮。It also usually contains buttons to update the record and to cancel the update operation. 若要以声明的方式指定自定义模板，请在 控件内添加 `EditItemTemplate` 元素。To specify the custom template declaratively, add an `EditItemTemplate` element inside the control. 然后，将模板的内容和控件添加到 `EditItemTemplate` 元素。Then add the contents and controls for template to the `EditItemTemplate` element. 您可以通过使用双向绑定表达式将字段与输入控件相关联。You can associate a field with an input control by using a two-way binding expression. 这使 控件可以在 "编辑" 模式下自动在项的关联输入控件中显示原始字段值。This enables the control to automatically display the original field value in the associated input control for the item in edit mode. 当更新记录时， 控件可以从关联的输入控件中自动提取更新的字段值。When a record is updated, the control can automatically extract the updated field value from the associated input control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定表达式概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178366(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178366(v=vs.100)). 若要创建执行内置 "取消" 和 "更新" 操作的按钮，请向模板添加一个按钮控件。To create buttons that perform the built-in cancel and update operations, add a button control to the template. 将其 属性设置为下表中列出的值之一。Set its property to one of the values listed in the following table. |按钮类型Button type|CommandName 值CommandName value| |-----------------|-----------------------| |取消Cancel|退出"Cancel"| |更新Update|时更新"Update"| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在编辑模式下为项定义自定义模板。The following example shows how to define a custom template for the item in edit mode. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 当绑定到控件的数据源不包含任何记录，并且 属性设置为 时，空模板将显示在 控件中。The empty template is displayed in a control when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records and the property is set to . 将呈现模板而不是 模板。The template is rendered instead of the template. 如果 属性设置为 以外的值，则不会呈现 模板。If the property is set to a value other than , the template is not rendered. 您可以使用 属性为空模板定义自定义用户界面（UI）。You can define a custom user interface (UI) for the empty template by using the property. 若要以声明方式为空模板指定自定义模板，请在 控件内添加并 `EmptyDataTemplate` 元素。To specify a custom template declaratively for the empty template, add and `EmptyDataTemplate` element inside the control. 然后，可以将模板的内容添加到 `EmptyDataTemplate` 元素。You can then add the contents of the template to the `EmptyDataTemplate` element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为空模板定义自定义模板。The following example shows how to define a custom template for the empty template. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当当前页的最后一组中没有更多要显示的数据项时，空项显示在 控件中。The empty item is displayed in a control when there are no more data items to display in the last group of the current page. 仅当 设置为大于1的值时，才会发生这种情况。This can occur only if is set to a value greater than 1. 例如，在 控件中， 属性可能设置为5，并且从数据源返回的项的总数为8。For example, in a control, the property might be set to 5 and the total number of items returned from the data source is 8. 在这种情况下，最后一行数据将包含 模板定义的三个项，以及 模板定义的两个项。In that case, the last row of data will contain three items defined by the template and two items defined by the template. 可以通过使用 属性为空项定义自定义用户界面（UI）。You can define a custom user interface (UI) for the empty item by using the property. 若要以声明方式为空项指定自定义模板，请在 控件内添加 `EmptyItemTemplate` 元素。To specify a custom template declaratively for the empty item, add an `EmptyItemTemplate` element inside the control. 然后，可以将模板的内容添加到 `EmptyItemTemplate` 元素。You can then add the contents of the template to the `EmptyItemTemplate` element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为空项定义自定义模板。The following example shows how to define a custom template for the empty item. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当用户在逐页浏览数据绑定控件中的数据时，行选择是否保持。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether row selection persists when a user pages through data in a data-bound control.

value.span: 如果行选择保持，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if row selection persists; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以指定在 控件处于分页模式时所选行的保留方式。You can specify how selected rows are persisted when the control is in paging mode. 默认情况下，行选择基于行索引。By default, row selection is based on row index. 在每一页上都选择了同一行（例如，第三行）。The same row (for example, the third row) is selected on each page. 或者，您可以基于所选行的数据键启用持久性。Alternatively, you can enable persistence based on the data key of the selected row. 在这种情况下，如果你选择第1页上的第3行并移动到第2页，则第2页上未选择任何行。In that case, if you select row 3 on page 1 and you move to page 2, no row is selected on page 2. 如果向后移动到第1页，则仍选择第3行。If you move back to page 1, row 3 is still selected. 若要启用此功能，请将此属性设置为 `true`。To enable this functionality, set this property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 在 ASP.NET 版本2.0、3.0 和3.5 中，行选择仅基于行索引。In versions 2.0, 3.0, and 3.5 of ASP.NET, row selection was based only on row index. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 4 中的行选择基于用于向后兼容的索引。By default, row selection in ASP.NET 4 is based on index for backward compatibility.

value.span: 默认值为 1，表示 控件将每组显示一项。

span.span: The default is 1, which indicates that the control will display one item per group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以指定要在 控件中组合在一起的项数。Use the property to specify the number of items to be grouped together in the control. （换言之，它指定要为控件的每个组显示的项目数。）对于每个组， 控件将呈现 模板的内容，并将项占位符替换为实际项内容。(In other words, this specifies the number of items to display for each group of the control.) For each group, the control renders the contents of the template and replaces the item placeholder with the actual item content. 它执行的次数与 属性定义的项数多。It does this as many times as the number of items defined by the property. 可以将 与 模板结合使用，以便在 控件中创建平铺布局。You can use with the template to create a tiled layout in the control. 在平铺表布局中，项在行中水平重复。In a tiled table layout, the items are repeated horizontally in a row. 项重复的次数由 属性指定。The numbers of times that an item is repeated is specified by the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性在 控件中创建平铺布局。The following example shows how to create a tiled layout in the control by using the property. 它还演示如何以编程方式更改此属性。It also shows how to change this property programmatically. remarks.format: ## Remarks 分隔符使你可以将具有自定义内容的元素放置在每个组之间。The separator enables you to put an element that has custom content between each group. 然后， 控件交替呈现 内容和 内容。The control then alternately renders the content and the content. 始终会呈现 内容。The content is always rendered last. 请确保在 模板中定义整行的内容，因为 控件将在 模板内呈现 内容。Make sure that you define the content for the whole row in the template, because the control renders the content inside the template. 例如，可以使用表行（`tr`）元素创建 控件中的组。For example, the groups in the control might be created by using a table row (`tr`) element. 如果 属性设置为3， 模板中必须将 `colspan` 属性设置为3。If the property is set to 3, the `colspan` attribute must be set to 3 in the template. 若要以声明方式为分隔符指定模板，请在 控件内添加 `GroupSeparatorTemplate` 元素。To specify a template declaratively for the separator, add a `GroupSeparatorTemplate` element inside the control. 然后，可以将模板的内容添加到 `GroupSeparatorTemplate` 元素。You can then add the contents of the template to the `GroupSeparatorTemplate` element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性在 控件中创建组分隔符。The following example shows how to create a group separator in the control by using the property. summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中的插入项的自定义内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the custom content for an insert item in the control.

value.span: 一个对象，包含 控件中的插入项的自定义内容。

span.span: An object that contains the custom content for the insert item in the control.

value.span: 默认值为 ，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性为 控件中的 "插入" 项定义自定义用户界面（UI）。Use the property to define a custom user interface (UI) for the insert item in the control. 此 UI 呈现在所显示项的开头或结尾。This UI is rendered either at the start or at the end of the displayed items. 使用 属性指定 UI 的呈现位置。You specify where the UI is rendered by using the property. 模板通常包含输入控件，用户可在其中输入新记录的值。The template usually contains the input controls for the user to enter the values for a new record. 它通常还包含用于插入记录和取消插入操作的按钮或超链接。It also usually contains buttons or hyperlinks to insert the record and to cancel the insert operation. 若要以声明的方式指定自定义模板，请在 `ListView` 元素内添加 `InsertItemTemplate` 元素。To specify the custom template declaratively, add an `InsertItemTemplate` element inside the `ListView` element. 然后，可以将模板的内容添加到 `InsertItemTemplate` 元素。You can then add the contents of the template to the `InsertItemTemplate` element. 您可以通过使用双向绑定表达式将字段与输入控件相关联。You can associate a field with an input control by using a two-way binding expression. 插入记录后， 控件将自动从关联的输入控件中提取字段值。When a record is inserted, the control automatically extracts the field value from the associated input control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定表达式概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178366(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178366(v=vs.100)). 若要创建执行内置取消和插入操作的按钮，请向模板添加一个按钮控件。To create buttons that perform the built-in cancel and insert operations, add a button control to the template. 将其 属性设置为下表中列出的值之一。Set its property to one of the values listed in the following table. |按钮类型Button type|CommandName 值CommandName value| |-----------------|-----------------------| |取消Cancel|退出"Cancel"| |插入Insert|&"Insert"| 可以通过使用 属性控制插入项在 控件中的位置。You can control the position of the insert item in the control by using the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为 控件的插入项定义自定义模板。The following example shows how to define a custom template for the insert item of a control. 此代码示例是为 事件提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the event. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法以编程方式在数据源中插入项。Use the method to programmatically insert an item in the data source. 此方法通常用于从 控件外插入项，如页上的其他控件。This method is typically used to insert an item from outside the control, such as from a different control on the page. 若要使用 方法，必须在 控件中定义 模板。To use the method, you must define an template in the control. 还必须将 属性设置为与 不同的值。You must also set the property to a value different from . 若要指定在插入操作之前是否执行页验证，请使用 `causesValidation` 参数。To specify whether page validation is performed before the insert operation, use the `causesValidation` parameter. 此方法引发 和 事件。This method raises the and events. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法以编程方式将 控件的插入项的内容插入到数据源中。The following example shows how to use the method to programmatically insert the contents of the insert item of a control into the data source. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). summary.span: 在请求取消操作之后、 控件取消插入或编辑操作之前发生。

span.span: Occurs when a cancel operation is requested, but before the control cancels the insert or edit operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击 或 模板中的 "取消" 按钮时，但在 控件取消插入或编辑操作之前， 控件将引发 事件。The control raises the event when a Cancel button in the or template is clicked, but before the control cancels the insert or edit operation. （"取消" 按钮是一个按钮控件，其 属性设置为 "取消"。）这使您可以在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程，如在将项目置于不需要的状态时停止取消操作。(A Cancel button is a button control whose property is set to "Cancel".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as stopping the cancel operation if it would put the item in an unwanted state. 将 对象传递到事件处理程序，这使您能够确定项的索引。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the index of the item. 它还使你能够指示应停止取消操作。It also lets you indicate that the cancel operation should be stopped. 若要停止操作，请将 对象的 属性设置为 "`true`"。To stop the operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建 事件处理程序。The following example shows how to create an event handler. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains text boxes that accept user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling/CS/ListViewItemCancelingCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling/VB/ListViewItemCancelingVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 当单击 控件中的按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a button in a control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击 控件中的按钮时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when a button in the control is clicked. 这使您可以在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程。This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs. 控件中的按钮还可以调用控件的内置功能。Buttons in a control can also invoke built-in functionality of the control. 下表列出了可与按钮的 属性一起使用的值，以便调用内置功能。The following table lists values that you can use with the property of a button in order to invoke built-in functionality. |CommandName 值CommandName value|说明Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |退出"Cancel"|取消编辑或插入操作。Cancels an edit or insert operation. 引发 事件。Raises the event.| |“Delete”"Delete"|从数据源中删除当前记录。Deletes the current record from the data source. 引发 和 事件。Raises the and events.| |单击"Select"|将 属性设置为项的 属性值。Sets the property to the property value for the item. 呈现项的 模板。Renders the template for the item. 引发 和 事件。Raises the and events.| |编辑"Edit"|将项置于编辑模式。Puts the item in edit mode. 呈现项的 模板。Renders the template for the item. 引发 事件。Raises the event.| |&"Insert"|将 模板中的绑定值插入到数据源中。Inserts the bound values from the template into the data source. 引发 和 事件。Raises the and events.| |时更新"Update"|用来自 模板的绑定值更新数据源中的当前记录。Updates the current record in the data source with the bound values from the template. 引发 和 事件。Raises the and events.| |进行"Sort"|对按钮的 `CommandArgument` 属性中列出的列进行排序。Sorts the columns listed in the `CommandArgument` property of the button. 引发 和 事件。Raises the and events.| 当单击上表中列出的按钮时，也会引发 事件。The event is also raised when a button that is listed in the previous table is clicked. 但建议使用表中列出的事件。However, it is recommended that you use the events listed in the table. 事件通常用于处理自定义操作。The event is usually used to handle custom operations. 将 对象传递到事件处理程序，这使您能够确定所单击的按钮的命令名和命令参数。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the command name and command argument of the button that was clicked. 若要确定命令名称，请使用 属性。To determine the command name, use the property. 若要确定命令参数，请使用 属性。To determine the command argument, use the property. 若要访问引发事件的控件，请使用 属性。To access the control that raised the event, use the property. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建 事件处理程序。The following example shows how to create an event handler. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemCommand/CS/ListViewItemCommandCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemCommand/VB/ListViewItemCommandVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 在 控件中创建项时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an item is created in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在呈现 控件之前，必须为控件中的每一项创建 对象。Before the control can be rendered, a object must be created for each item in the control. 创建 控件中的每个项时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when each item in the control is created. 这使您可以在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程，例如向项添加自定义内容。This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as adding custom content to an item. 将 对象传递到事件处理程序，这使你能够访问正在创建的项的属性。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to access the properties of the item that is being created. 若要访问项中的特定控件，请使用 对象的 属性中包含的 对象的 方法。To access a specific control in the item, use the method of the object that is contained in the property of the object. 您可以使用 "" 属性确定要创建的项目类型（数据项、插入项、空项）。You can determine which item type (data item, insert item, empty item) is being created by using the property. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

summary.span: 在数据项绑定到 控件中的数据时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a data item is bound to data in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在呈现 控件之前，必须将控件中的每一项绑定到数据源中的记录。Before the control can be rendered, each item in the control must be bound to a record in the data source. 当数据项绑定到 控件中的数据时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when a data item is bound to data in the control. （数据项由 对象表示。）这使您可以在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程，如修改绑定到项的数据值。(Data items are represented by objects.) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as modifying the values of the data that is bound to the item. 将 对象传递到事件处理程序，从而使您可以访问所绑定项的属性。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to access the properties of the item that is being bound. 若要访问项中的特定控件，请使用 对象的 属性中包含的 对象的 方法。To access a specific control in the item, use the method of the object that is contained in the property of the object. 您可以使用 属性确定要绑定的项类型（数据项、插入项、空项）。You can determine which item type (data item, insert item, empty item) is being bound by using the property. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 事件。The following example shows how to use the event. summary.span: 在请求删除操作且 控件删除项之后发生。

span.span: Occurs when a delete operation is requested, after the control deletes the item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击项的 "删除" 按钮或调用 方法时，在 控件删除该项后，会引发 事件。The event is raised when an item's Delete button is clicked or the method is called, after the control deletes the item. （"删除" 按钮是 属性设置为 "Delete" 的按钮控件。）这使您可以在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程，如检查删除操作的结果。(A Delete button is a button control whose property is set to "Delete".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as checking the results of the delete operation. 将 对象传递到事件处理程序，这使您可以确定数据源中受影响的行数。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the number of rows that were affected in the data source. 它还允许你确定可能发生的异常。It also lets you determine what exceptions might have occurred. 通过将 对象的 属性设置为 `true`，可以指示是否已在事件处理程序中处理异常。You can indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the property of the object to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为 事件添加事件处理程序。The following example shows how to add an event handler for the event. span.span: Occurs when a delete operation is requested, but before the control deletes the item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击项的 "删除" 按钮或调用 方法时，但在 控件删除项之前，将引发 事件。The event is raised when an item's Delete button is clicked or the method is called, but before the control deletes the item. （"删除" 按钮是 属性设置为 "Delete" 的按钮控件。）这使您可以在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程，如取消删除操作。(A Delete button is a button control whose property is set to "Delete".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as canceling the delete operation. 将 对象传递到事件处理程序，这使您能够确定当前项的索引。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the index of the current item. 它还使你能够指示应取消删除操作。It also lets you indicate that the delete operation should be canceled. 若要取消删除操作，请将 对象的 属性设置为 "`true`"。To cancel the delete operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 在将值传递给数据源之前，还可以使用 和 集合。You can also work with the and collections before the values are passed to the data source. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以声明方式为 事件添加事件处理程序。The following example shows how to declaratively add an event handler for the event. summary.span: 在请求编辑操作之后、 项进入编辑模式之前发生。

span.span: Occurs when an edit operation is requested, but before the item is put in edit mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击项的 "编辑" 按钮时，但在将 项置于编辑模式之前，将引发 事件。The event is raised when an item's Edit button is clicked, but before the item is put in edit mode. （"编辑" 按钮是 属性设置为 "编辑" 的按钮控件。）这使您可以在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程，如取消编辑操作。(An Edit button is a button control whose property is set to "Edit".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as canceling the edit operation. 将 对象传递到事件处理程序，这使您能够确定当前项的索引。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the index of the current item. 它还使你能够指示应取消编辑操作。It also lets you indicate that the edit operation should be canceled. 若要取消编辑操作，请将 对象的 属性设置为 "`true`"。To cancel the edit operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为 事件添加事件处理程序。The following example shows how to add an event handler for the event. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). summary.span: 在请求插入操作且 控件在数据源中插入项之后发生。

span.span: Occurs when an insert operation is requested, after the control has inserted the item in the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击 模板中的 "插入" 按钮或调用 方法时，在 控件在数据源中插入该项后， 控件将引发 事件。The control raises the event when an Insert button in the template is clicked or the method is called, after the control inserts the item in the data source. （"插入" 按钮是 属性设置为 "插入" 的按钮控件。）这使您可以在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程，如检查插入操作的结果。(An Insert button is a button control whose property is set to "Insert".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as checking the results of an insert operation. 将 对象传递到事件处理程序，这使您可以确定受影响的记录数。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the number of records affected. 它还允许你确定可能发生的异常。It also lets you determine what exceptions might have occurred. 若要确定受插入操作影响的记录数，请使用 属性。To determine the number of records that were affected by the insert operation, use the property. 若要确定是否发生了任何异常，请使用 属性。To determine whether any exceptions occurred, use the property. 还可以通过设置 属性，指示是否已在事件处理程序中处理异常。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the property. 如果要访问插入的记录的值，请使用 属性。If you want to access the values of the inserted record, use the property. 如果 属性报告未插入任何项，则可以通过将 属性设置为 `true`，将插入值重新绑定到 模板。If the property reports that no items were inserted, you can rebind the insert values to the template by setting the property to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为 事件添加事件处理程序。The following example shows how to add an event handler for the event. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). span.span: Occurs when an insert operation is requested, but before the control performs the insert.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击 模板中的 "插入" 按钮或调用 方法，但在 控件插入记录之前， 控件将引发 事件。The control raises the event when an Insert button in the template is clicked or the method is called, but before the control inserts the record. （"插入" 按钮是 属性设置为 "插入" 的按钮控件。）这使您可以在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程，如在将记录插入到数据源之前对记录的值进行 HTML 编码。(An Insert button is a button control whose property is set to "Insert".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as HTML-encoding the values of a record before it is inserted in the data source. 将 对象传递到事件处理程序，这使您能够确定发送到 控件的可选命令参数的值。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the value of an optional command argument sent to the control. 它还使你能够指示应取消插入操作。It also lets you indicate that the insert operation should be canceled. 若要取消插入操作，请将 属性设置为 `true`。To cancel the insert operation, set the property to `true`. 您可以使用 属性读取或修改新记录的字段值。You can read or modify the field values for the new record by using the property. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为 事件添加事件处理程序。The following example shows how to add an event handler for the event. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含接受用户输入的控件，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains controls that accept user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于存储 控件中的数据项。The property is used to store the data items in a control. 控件通过为数据源中的当前数据页中的每个记录创建一个 对象，来自动填充 集合。The control automatically populates the collection by creating one object for each record in the current page of data in the data source. 然后将每个对象添加到集合中。It then adds each object to the collection. 此属性通常用于访问控件中的特定项或循环访问项的完整集合。This property is usually used to access a specific item in the control or to iterate though the complete collection of items. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 集合来访问 控件中正在编辑的项。The following example shows how to use the collection to access the item that is being edited in a control. 此代码示例是为 事件提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性定义用于显示数据项的自定义用户界面（UI）。Use the property to define a custom user interface (UI) to display the data items. 控件需要 模板。The template is required by the control. 它通常包含用于显示记录字段值的控件。It usually contains controls to display the field values of a record. 如果希望允许用户修改数据，通常还会将按钮添加到 模板，使用户能够选择记录、切换到编辑模式或删除记录。If you want to let users modify the data, you also usually add buttons to the template that let the user select a record, switch to edit mode, or delete a record. 若要以声明的方式指定自定义模板，请在 控件内添加 `ItemTemplate` 元素。To specify the custom template declaratively, add an `ItemTemplate` element inside the control. 然后，可以将模板的内容添加到 `ItemTemplate` 元素。You can then add the contents of the template to the `ItemTemplate` element. 若要显示绑定到控件的数据源的字段值，请使用数据绑定表达式。To display the field values of the data source that is bound to the control, use a data-binding expression. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定表达式概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178366(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178366(v=vs.100)). 若要创建执行内置的 "选择"、"删除" 和 "编辑" 操作的按钮，请将 "按钮" 控件添加到模板。To create buttons that perform the built-in select, delete, and edit operations, add a button control to the template. 将其 属性设置为下表中列出的值之一。Set its property to one of the values listed in the following table. |按钮类型Button type|CommandName 值CommandName value| |-----------------|-----------------------| |删除Delete|“Delete”"Delete"| |编辑Edit|编辑"Edit"| |选择Select|单击"Select"| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为 控件中的数据项定义自定义模板。The following example shows how to define a custom template for a data item in the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). span.span: Occurs when an update operation is requested, but before the control updates the item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击项的 "更新" 按钮或调用 方法，但在 控件更新项之前，将引发 事件。The event is raised when an item's Update button is clicked or the method is called, but before the control updates the item. （"更新" 按钮是一个按钮控件，其 属性设置为 "Update"。）这使您可以在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程，如取消更新操作。(An Update button is a button control whose property is set to "Update".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as canceling the update operation. 将 对象传递到事件处理程序，这使您能够确定当前项的索引。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the index of the current item. 它还使你能够指示应取消更新操作。It also lets you indicate that the update operation should be canceled. 若要取消更新操作，请将 对象的 属性设置为 "`true`"。To cancel the update operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 在将值传递给数据源之前，您可以使用 、和 集合。You can work with the , , and collections before the values are passed to the data source. 使用这些集合的典型方法是对用户提供的值进行 HTML 编码，然后将用户提供的值存储在数据源中。A typical way to use these collections is to HTML-encode the values supplied by the user before they are stored in the data source. 这有助于防止脚本注入攻击。This helps prevent script injection attacks. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为 事件添加事件处理程序。The following example shows how to add an event handler for the event. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdating#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdating/CS/ListViewItemUpdatingCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdating#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdating/VB/ListViewItemUpdatingVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在呈现 控件之前，必须创建 模板，使其充当控件的根容器。Before the control can be rendered, the template must be created to serve as the root container for the control. 创建 控件中的布局模板时，会引发 事件。The event is raised when the layout template in the control is created. 这使您可以在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程。This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中的根容器的自定义内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the custom content for the root container in a control.

value.span: 一个对象，包含 控件中的根容器的自定义内容。

span.span: An object that contains the custom content for the root container in a control.

value.span: 默认值为 ，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性定义 控件的根容器的自定义用户界面（UI）。Use the property to define a custom user interface (UI) for the root container of the control. 若要指定布局模板，请在 控件内添加 `LayoutTemplate` 元素。To specify the layout template, add a `LayoutTemplate` element inside the control. 然后，可以将模板的内容添加到 `LayoutTemplate` 元素。You can then add the contents of the template to the `LayoutTemplate` element. 内容必须包含占位符控件，如 模板定义的项的表行（`tr`）元素或 模板定义的组。The content must include a placeholder control such as a table row (`tr`) element for the items that are defined by the template or for groups that are defined by the template. 占位符控件必须将 `runat` 特性设置为 "server"，并将 `ID` 特性设置为 或 属性的值，具体取决于 控件是否正在使用组。The placeholder control must have the `runat` attribute set to "server" and the `ID` attribute set to the value of the or the property, depending on whether the control is using groups. 控件不需要 模板。The template is not required by the control. 您可以使用没有 的 控件，也可以在没有具有已知 ID 的占位符服务器控件的情况下使用。You can use the control without a and also without a placeholder server control with a known ID. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为 控件中的根容器定义自定义模板。The following example shows how to define a custom template for the root container in the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate/CS/ListViewEditItemTemplateCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate/VB/ListViewEditItemTemplateVB.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何使用 控件，而无需在控件中定义 模板。The following example shows how to use the control without defining a template in the control. 还未指定具有已知 ID 的服务器控件。A server control with a known ID is also not specified. ``` <% Eval("LastName")%> ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件使用 方法来处理通过控件层次结构向上传递的事件。The method is used by the control to optionally handle events that are passed up through the control hierarchy. 它通过检查 `e` 参数中包含的 对象的属性来确定是否要处理事件。It determines whether to handle an event by examining the properties of the object that are contained in the `e` parameter. 当必须处理某个事件时，该方法会执行相应的操作。When an event must be handled, the method performs the appropriate action. 其他事件将被忽略并向上传递控件层次结构。Other events are ignored and passed up the control hierarchy. 此方法的返回值指示是处理事件还是将事件向上传递到控件层次结构。The return value of this method indicates whether to handle the event or to pass the event up the control hierarchy. 当单击控件识别的某个按钮时， 控件将重写此方法的基实现以执行相应的操作。The control overrides the base implementation of this method to perform the appropriate action when one of the buttons that is recognized by the control is clicked. 下表列出了 控件识别的按钮。The following table lists the buttons that the control recognizes. |CommandName 值CommandName value|说明Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |退出"Cancel"|取消编辑或插入操作。Cancels an edit or insert operation. 引发 事件。Raises the event.| |“Delete”"Delete"|从数据源中删除当前记录。Deletes the current record from the data source. 引发 和 事件。Raises the and events.| |单击"Select"|将 属性设置为项的 属性值。Sets the property to the property value for the item. 呈现项的 模板。Renders the template for the item. 引发 和 事件。Raises the and events.| |编辑"Edit"|将项置于编辑模式。Puts the item in edit mode. 呈现项的 模板。Renders the template for the item. 引发 事件。Raises the event.| |&"Insert"|将 模板中的绑定值插入到数据源中。Inserts the bound values from the template into the data source. 引发 和 事件。Raises the and events.| |时更新"Update"|用来自 模板的绑定值更新数据源中的当前记录。Updates the current record in the data source with the bound values from the template. 引发 和 事件。Raises the and events.| |进行"Sort"|对按钮的 `CommandArgument` 属性中列出的列进行排序。Sorts the columns listed in the `CommandArgument` property of the button. 引发 和 事件。Raises the and events.| 如果其中一个按钮引发由控件处理的事件，则此版本的方法将返回 `true`。This version of the method returns `true` if one of these buttons raises an event that is handled by the control. 有关事件冒泡的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about event bubbling, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当通过此方法通知时，Web 服务器控件必须执行创建和设置实例所需的任何初始化步骤。When notified by this method, Web server controls must perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance. 在服务器控件生命周期的此阶段中，尚未填充控件的视图状态。In this stage of the server control's life cycle, the control's view state has not yet been populated. 此外，如果调用此方法，则不能访问其他服务器控件，无论它是此控件的子控件还是父控件。Additionally, you cannot access other server controls when this method is called, regardless of whether it is a child or parent of this control. 不保证其他服务器控件已创建并且可供访问。Other server controls are not guaranteed to be created and ready for access. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 利用 方法，派生类还可以处理事件，而无需附加委托。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，调用基类的 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When you override in a derived class, call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as stopping the cancel operation if it would put the item in an unwanted state. 控件调用 方法来引发 事件。The method is called by the control to raise the event. 它通常由控件开发人员在扩展 类时使用。It is typically used by control developers when extending the class. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 利用 方法，派生类还可以处理事件，而无需附加委托。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

summary.span: 获取 控件中的选定项的数据键值。

span.span: Gets the data-key value for the selected item in a control.

value.span: 控件中的选定项的数据键值。

span.span: The data key for the selected item in a control.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示当前未选择项。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that no item is currently selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置 属性后， 控件将使用指定字段的一个或多个值为控件中的每一项创建一个 对象。When the property is set, the control creates a object for each item in the control by using the value or values of the specified field or fields. 然后， 对象将添加到控件的 集合。The objects are then added to the control's collection. 通常， 属性用于检索 控件中特定数据项的 对象。Normally, the property is used to retrieve the object for a specific data item in the control. 但是，如果要仅检索当前选定项的 对象，则可以使用 属性作为快捷方式。However, if you want to retrieve only the object of the currently selected item, you can use the property as a shortcut. 使用 属性与从 属性指定的索引中的 集合检索 对象相同。Using the property is the same as retrieving the object from the collection at the index that is specified by the property. 你还可以使用 属性直接检索当前选定项的数据键值。You can also use the property to retrieve the data-key value for the currently selected item directly. 如果正在创建 对象，但要访问第一个字段之外的键字段，请在 对象的 属性中使用 indexed 属性。If you are creating a object and you want to access a key field other than the first field, use the indexed property in the property of the object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用第二个键字段作为主/从方案中的参数。The following example shows how to use the second key field as a parameter in a master/detail scenario. 控件用于显示 AdventureWorks 数据库的产品库存表中的记录。A control is used to display records from the Product Inventory table of the AdventureWorks database. 在 控件中选择某项时，该产品的详细信息将显示在另一个 控件中。When an item is selected in the control, the details of the product are displayed in another control. ProductID 是第一个 控件中的第二个密钥名称。ProductID is the second key name in the first control. 为了访问第二个键，代码使用 `ProductInventoryListView.SelectedDataKey[1]` 的值（`ProductInventoryListView.SelectedDataKey(1)` 在 Visual Basic 中）作为 对象的 。To access the second key, the code uses the value of `ProductInventoryListView.SelectedDataKey[1]` (`ProductInventoryListView.SelectedDataKey(1)` in Visual Basic) as the for the object. 此参数对象又由第二个 控件绑定到 控件使用。This parameter object is in turn used by the control that the second control is bound to. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedDataKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedDataKey/CS/ListViewSelectedDataKeyCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedDataKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedDataKey/VB/ListViewSelectedDataKeyVB.aspx#1)]

span.span: Occurs when an item's Select button is clicked, but before the control handles the select operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击项的 "选择" 按钮时，但在 控件处理选择操作之前，将引发 事件。The event is raised when an item's Select button is clicked, but before the control handles the select operation. （"选择" 按钮是 属性设置为 "Select" 的按钮控件。）这使您可以在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程，如取消选择操作。(A Select button is a button control whose property is set to "Select".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as canceling the select operation. > [!NOTE] > 以编程方式设置 属性时，不会引发此事件。This event is not raised when you programmatically set the property. 将 对象传递到事件处理程序，这使您可以确定用户选择的项的索引。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the index of the item that was selected by the user. 它还使你能够指示应取消选择操作。It also lets you indicate that the selection operation should be canceled. 若要取消选择操作，请将 对象的 属性设置为 "`true`"。To cancel the selection operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为 事件创建事件处理程序。The following example shows how create an event handler for the event. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanging#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanging/CS/ListViewItemSelectedIndexChangingCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanging#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanging/VB/ListViewItemSelectedIndexChangingVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性为 控件中的选定项定义自定义用户界面（UI）。Use the property to define a custom user interface (UI) for the selected item in a control. 通常用于区分选定项与其他显示项。The is usually used to differentiate the selected item from the other displayed items. 呈现 ，而不是所选项的 模板。 is rendered instead of the template for the selected item. 若要以声明的方式指定自定义模板，请在 控件内添加 `SelectedItemTemplate` 元素。To specify the custom template declaratively, add a `SelectedItemTemplate` element inside the control. 然后，可以将模板的内容添加到 `SelectedItemTemplate` 元素。You can then add the contents of the template to the `SelectedItemTemplate` element. 若要显示绑定到控件的数据源的字段值，请使用数据绑定表达式。To display the field values of the data source that is bound to the control, use a data-binding expression. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定表达式概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178366(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178366(v=vs.100)). 你还可以将按钮添加到 。You can also add buttons to the . 若要创建执行内置删除或编辑操作的按钮，请向模板添加一个按钮控件，并将其 属性设置为下表中列出的值之一。To create buttons that perform the built-in delete or edit operations, add a button control to the template and set its property to one of the values listed in the following table. |按钮类型Button type|CommandName 值CommandName value| |-----------------|-----------------------| |删除Delete|“Delete”"Delete"| |编辑Edit|编辑"Edit"| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性定义 控件中的选定项的内容。The following example shows how to use the property to define the contents of the selected item in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemDeleting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemDeleting/CS/ListViewItemItemDeletingCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemDeleting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemDeleting/VB/ListViewItemItemDeletingVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以设置为以逗号分隔的字段名称列表，表示数据源的主键。The property can be set to a comma-separated list of field names that represent the primary key of the data source. 如果已设置，则 控件将使用指定字段的一个或多个值自动为控件中的每一项创建一个 的对象。If it is set, the control automatically creates a object for each item in the control by using the value or values of the specified field or fields. 然后， 对象将添加到控件的 集合。The objects are then added to the control's collection. 通常， 属性用于获取 控件中特定数据项的 对象。Normally, the property is used to get the object for a specific data item in the control. 但是，如果只想获取当前选定项的 对象，则可以使用 属性作为快捷方式。However, if you want to get only the object of the currently selected item, you can use the property as a shortcut. 您还可以通过使用 属性，直接确定选定项的第一个键字段的数据键值。You can also directly determine the data-key value of the first key field of the selected item by using the property. 如果要创建 对象并希望访问第一个字段之外的键字段，请使用 属性。If you are creating a object and want to access a key field other than the first field, use the property. 有关示例，请参见 属性。For an example, see the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用第一个键字段作为主/详细方案中的参数。The following example shows how to use the first key field as a parameter in a master/detail scenario. 在 控件中选择某个项时， 属性将用作 对象的 。When an item is selected in the control, the property is used as the for the object. 此参数对象又由第二个 控件绑定到 控件使用。This parameter object is in turn used by the control that the second control is bound to. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemDeleting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemDeleting/CS/ListViewItemItemDeletingCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemDeleting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemDeleting/VB/ListViewItemItemDeletingVB.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来确定键字段的值。The following example shows how to use the property to determine the value of the key field. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法，通过使用指定的排序表达式和方向以编程方式对 控件中显示的数据进行排序。Use the method to programmatically sort the data that is displayed in the control by using the specified sort expression and direction. 排序表达式指定要进行排序的一个或多个列。The sort expression specifies the column or columns to sort with. 若要对多个列进行排序，请创建一个排序表达式，其中包含以逗号分隔的字段名称列表。To sort multiple columns, create a sort expression that contains a comma-separated list of field names. 排序方向指示是按升序还是降序执行排序。The sort direction indicates whether sorting is performed in ascending or descending order. 如果要从控件之外对 控件的内容进行排序，则通常使用此方法，例如从页面上的不同控件进行排序。You typically use this method when you want to sort the contents of the control from outside the control, such as from a different control on the page. 此方法还可用于以编程方式设置 控件第一次呈现时的默认排序顺序。This method is also used to programmatically set a default sort order for the control when it is first rendered. 此方法引发 和 事件。This method raises the and events. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法以编程方式按多个数据字段对 控件进行排序。The following example shows how to use the method to programmatically sort the control by multiple data fields. span.span: Updates the record at the specified index in the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法以编程方式更新数据源中指定索引处的记录。Use the method to programmatically update the record at the specified index in the data source. 如果要从 控件之外的其他控件（如页面上的不同控件）更新记录，通常使用此方法。You typically use this method when you want to update a record from outside the control, such as from a different control on the page. > [!NOTE] > 只能为包含双向数据绑定输入控件的项调用此方法。This method can be called only for an item that contains a two-way data-bound input control. 有关双向绑定表达式的详细信息，请参阅[绑定到数据库](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178361(v=vs.100))。For more information about two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178361(v=vs.100)). 若要指定在更新操作之前是否执行页验证，请使用 `causesValidation` 参数。To specify whether page validation is performed before the update operation, use the `causesValidation` parameter. 此方法引发 和 事件。This method raises the and events. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法以编程方式更新数据源中的 项。The following example shows how to use the method to programmatically update a item in the data source. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem/CS/ListViewUpdateItemCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem/VB/ListViewUpdateItemVB.aspx#1)]
